scn

Class Scene

  • java.lang.Object
    • scn.Scene
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    input.EventHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Credits, Demo, DifficultySelect, Game, GameEnding, GameOver, Shop, Title 

    public abstract class Scene
extends java.lang.Object
implements input.EventHandler

    • Field Detail

      • main

        protected Main main

    • Constructor Detail

      • Scene

        protected Scene(Main main)
        Top level Constructor for a scene
        Parameters:
        main - the main class holding the scene, ie the running instance of the game

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public abstract void start()
        Handles initialisation of a scene. Runs once only at the start of the scene

      • update

        public abstract void update(double dt)
        Handles updates of all objects requiring updates in the scene Runs regularly when called by Main
        Parameters:
        dt - the delta time since the last update was carried out

      • draw

        public abstract void draw()
        Handles drawing of all drawable objects in the scene to the window Runs regularly when called by main

      • close

        public abstract void close()
        Used to cleanly exit a scene, e.g. halting the scene's music so it does not overlap the next scene's music Runs once only when a scene is closed

      • playSound

        public abstract void playSound(audio.Sound sound)
        Plays a sound effect Can be used by a scene's object to request a sound to be played, e.g. aircraft can request a warning beep when their separation radius is infringed.
        Parameters:
        sound - the sound to be played
